desc: A monthly dose of fertiliser in spring and summer will encourage healthy new growth.
name: Combo trà sữa 1

desc: If you notice any stems are looking a bit sad, she’s really easy to prune. Just use clean scissors to cut her back and you’ll encourage healthy new growth.
name: Combo trà sữa 2

desc: He’ll enjoy some time outdoors at the height of summer, but introduce him to the outside gradually, so he can adjust to the stronger sun.
name: Combo trà sữa 3

desc: Susie is a superb plant for the bedroom because she stores oxygen during the day, then releases it all at night.
name: Combo trà sữa 4

desc: If he’s growing well and you want him to keep getting bigger, consider repotting him every couple of years. Check our guide to repotting.
name: Combo trà sữa 5

desc: Keep her looking her shiny best by giving her leaves a gentle wipe with a soft cloth every now and again. Not often; just when she's looking dusty.
name: Combo trà sữa 6

desc: She’s naturally a slow grower but if you want to give her a boost in spring and summer, give her a feed about once a month.
name: Combo trà sữa 7

desc: If he’s growing well and you want him to keep getting bigger, consider repotting him every couple of years. Check our guide to repotting.
name: Combo trà sữa 8

desc: We donate $1 per Pippa sold to icanyoucantoo, a grassroots initiative that supports young people from non-privileged communities achieve their career dreams.
name: Combo trà sữa 9

desc: Those majestic leaves can get dusty. Dust make it harder for him to absorb light, so give his leaves a gentle wipe if they look grubby.
name: Combo trà sữa 10

desc: In spring and summer, give her a liquid fertiliser every month to help her make strong new growth.
name: Combo trà sữa 11

desc: The larger Phil comes with a moss pole for support. If he outgrows it, no need to cut him back. Add another moss pole on top and let him keep growing.
name: Combo trà sữa 12

desc: Penny grows toward the light. It’s not essential, but you can keep her growing nice and evenly (rather than all on one side) by rotating her pot every few days.
name: Combo trà sữa 13

desc: If he’s growing well and you want him to keep getting bigger, consider repotting him every couple of years. Check our guide to repotting.
name: Combo trà sữa 14

desc: If you notice dust building up on those lovely leaves, gently wipe it off. It will keep his pores clean and let his leaves breathe freely.
name: Combo trà sữa 15

desc: If you notice dust building up on those lovely leaves, gently wipe it off. It will keep his pores clean and let his leaves breathe freely.
name: Combo trà sữa 16

desc: Really, there’s no extra care needed for this guy, but he’ll appreciate you keeping his leaves free of dust by wiping them occasionally with a soft cloth.
name: Combo trà sữa 17

desc: You can keep him extra happy by wiping his leaves whenever they get a bit dusty. It helps him breathe more easily.
name: Combo trà sữa 18

desc: A healthy plant will develop little plantlets on long stems. You can pinch these off and put them in compost to easily create new plants.
name: Combo trà sữa 19

desc: His leaves can get dusty, which isn’t good for his health. Give him a gentle clean when needed.
name: Combo trà sữa 20

desc: If you notice her getting ‘leggy’ (long stems with few leaves), don’t be afraid to prune any sad growth with a pair of clean secateurs.
name: Combo trà sữa 21

desc: If their stems start to get a bit long pinch out the longest ones and they’ll keep their bushy shape.
name: Combo trà sữa 22

desc: Check your window for drafts. In winter, cold drafts can upset your plants so you may want to move them somewhere warmer.
name: Combo trà sữa 23

desc: Keep those leaves shiny by giving them an occasional gentle wipe with a cloth. Dana don’t do dust.
name: Combo trà sữa 24

desc: She’s a very fast grower. Great if you want long stems, but don’t be afraid to cut them back if you’d like to keep them shorter.
name: Combo trà sữa 25
